data.title: Ben Kingsley: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Ben Kingsley: Check out the list of all Ben Kingsley movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Ben Kingsley news on Times of India.
data.text:
'Wonder Man': Crew member dies in accident on sets of Marvel series

ANI / Feb 07, 2024, 12:52 (IST)

A crew member of the Marvel series 'Wonder Man' died in an accident on set. The incident occurred at Radford Studios, where a rigger fell from the rafters. Marvel Studio expressed condolences and is supporting the investigation. An investigation is underway by the California Division of Occupational Safety and Health.

Marvel's 'Wonder Man' crew member falls to his death on sets

etimes.in / Feb 07, 2024, 05:16 (IST)

A crew member of the Marvel Studios television series "Wonder Man" lost his life on Tuesday after falling off a catwalk while going about his rigging duties. Following the news of his demise, a Marvel spokesperson issued a statement and offered their condolences to the man's grieving family

Didn't need to practice sleeping on floor like Ben Kingsley in 'Gandhi': Pankaj Tripathi

ANI / Jan 10, 2024, 17:35 (IST)

Portraying Atal Bihari Vajpayee in 'Main Atal Hoon,' Pankaj Tripathi revealed that his upbringing's similarity to the late Prime Minister's made it a seamless transition into the character. In contrast to actors making significant sacrifices for historical roles, Tripathi found the role effortless, crediting his upbringing that mirrored Vajpayee's life. Director Vinod Bhanushali insisted on Tripathi for the film, recognizing the perfect fit. Tripathi's straightforward life journey, growing up in a family that wore dhoti kurtas, provided a natural alignment with Vajpayee's background. Despite initial apprehension about doing justice to Vajpayee's character, Tripathi accepted the challenge, emphasizing that his childhood experiences readily met the character's requirements.

Om Puri's 72nd birth anniversary: Remembering the time when Om Puri went down on his knees for Helen Mirren

etimes.in / Oct 18, 2022, 14:56 (IST)

Om Puri would have turned 72 today if he had not passed away in 2017. He was once shooting with the awesome Helen Mirren in the French town of Albi for Swedish director Lasse Hallstrom’s The Hundred-Foot Journey. He was happy to be in Albi. It’s so peaceful and beautiful he had said in a previous interview and added, I’m very proud of whatever we’ve shot so far. I saw the rushes.

Our role is to constantly surprise and refresh: Ben Kingsley on his MCU return in 'Wonder Man'

ANI / Sep 12, 2022, 12:00 (IST)

Hollywood star Ben Kingsley, who made a cameo appearance in last year's 'Shang-Chi' as Trevor Slattery, is set to return in a new Disney+ series titled 'Wonder Man'.

Free screening of 'Gandhi' begins in theatres across Telangana

etimes.in / Aug 09, 2022, 11:38 (IST)

'Free screening of the 1982 Oscar-winning movie 'Gandhi' began in 552 theatres across Telangana on Tuesday. The movie in Telugu and Hindi will be screened from 10 a.m. to 1.15 p.m. daily from August 9 to August 22.The state government has made elaborate arrangements for the free of cost screening of 'Gandhi', starring Ben Kingsley in the title role. Officials said 22 lakh school children are expected to watch the movie in theatres.

'Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings' to release in India on September 3

TNN & Agencies / Aug 20, 2021, 13:37 (IST)

'Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings', which is touted as Marvel's first film with an Asian lead, is set to release in India on September 3.
